org.openimaj.math.geometry.point

Class Point2dImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.geometry.point.Point2dImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Coordinate, Point2d
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpatialLocation

    public class Point2dImpl
extends Object
implements Point2d, Cloneable
    Simple concrete implementation of a two dimensional point.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
